name: My First Mobile Phone
description:
With My First Mobile Phone your kids can learn numbers and basic mobile functions with cute and funny animal sounds.
Nowadays every child likes to play on mobile. It’s only natural. This app suitable young children who want to learn the basics of mobile functions.
You don't need to buy an expensive kids mobile to play. This virtual mobile looks like the "real" toy mobiles.
This phone app is a fantastic free game to keep your kids entertained. Touch the buttons to hear its sound (dial tone or animal sounds). You can select with game mode buttons. All interactive actions are accompanied with sounds and vibration.
It turns your precious iphone into a mobile phone toy. Random colorful ballons, detailed animal cartoons and high quality sounds, voices are seen and heard on the screen.
Play with your parents and explore all the hidden functions as well!

Features:
- Two gameplay mode (tone fun and learning numbers)
- Two color mobile, one for girls, one for boys
- Learning numbers 1-10 with animals
- Learn basic mobile functions easy
- 10 different cartoon type funny animal sounds
- Realistic tone mode with calling function
- High resolution graphics for HD ipads and mobiles!
